        getState in interface com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent<DiagramConfiguration>

        a component state. All properties and public fields are serialized. Only values, which differ from default (i.e. the value of newly instantiated class) are serialized. null value indicates that no state should be stored

      • loadState

        public void loadState(DiagramConfiguration state)
        Description copied from interface: com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent
        This method is called when new component state is loaded. A component should expect this method to be called at any moment of its lifecycle. The method can and will be called several times, if config files were externally changed while IDEA running.
        Specified by:
        loadState in interface com.intellij.openapi.components.PersistentStateComponent<DiagramConfiguration>
        Parameters:
        state - loaded component state
        See Also:
        XmlSerializerUtil.copyBean(Object, Object)
